page.title: 16SOCIAL CONCERN (2) SPETCHLEY
page.content: {PARISH AND COMMUNITY LIFE As there are several churches in a small area of population, it is likely that one of the old Anglican parish churches may have to be closed as a centre of worship.{Churchill}was earlier designated for closure but was kept alive as a community , by the action of one lady parishioner. It cannot now be used for weddings etc. but still has a loyal congregation. { All Saints at Spetchley}is now being considered by the{Church {Commissioners}for discontinued use as a place of worship . { Bredicot church }has a congregation from outside the parish to swell its numbers.It boasts no electric light, as yet, which is the reason why the five services a year are in summer at 3pm.
